Package core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AI  
    Behavior
    Base class for concrete behaviors.
    CheckBox
    Popup an input dialog including (multiple) check boxes and stores the input.
    CloudComment
    Popup a cloud with text in it, like the waifu is speaking.
    CounterAction
    Base class of counter actions like InputBox, CloudComment etc.
    CounterActionFactory  
    InputBox
    Popup an input dialog for text inputs and stores the input.
    KeyTyped
    Listen for a certain key and if it's typed calls Behavior.update().
    RadioBtn
    Popup an input dialog including (multiple) radio buttons and stores the input.
    Serializer  
    SkinSwitch
    Change the skin of the waifu.
    StringTyped
    Listen for a certain sequence of characters (like multiple KeyTypeds after each other).
    TextHighlighted
    Listen for any text highlighted and stores it immediately.
    Time
    Be able to store year, month, day, hour and minute.
    TimeReached
    Checks if the given time is reached (when updated by TimeChecker).
    UserAction
    Base class of user actions like KeyTyped, TimeReached etc.
    UserActionFactory  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Emotion
